disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Moderate ozone air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 15 June to end of Friday 17 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Staying fine and dry throughout the period, with some cloud but lengthy spells of sunshine. Becoming very warm, or potentially hot with light winds.<br/><br/>The formation of ground-level ozone is possible as locally emitted and longer-range pollutants may react photochemically in sunny weather. 'Moderate' Ozone likely occur.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' for the following pollutants throughout the forecast period:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>
